DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the efficacy and safety of the investigational drug in the treatment of COPD in comparison with a placebo.
DOC.criteria: Medical diagnosis of COPD Current or prior history of cigarette smoking Medical diagnosis of asthma Chest xray (CXR) prior to Day 1 diagnostic of significant disease other than COPD Significant condition or disease other than COPD
